text: Nikolay Davydenko was the defending champion, but lost to Gilles Simon in the third round. James Blake won the title, defeating Mardy Fish 7–5, 6–4 in the final. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Section 1=== ===Section 2=== ===Section 3=== ===Section 4=== ==External links== *Men's Singles Draw 1 2 Men's Singles
title: 2007 Pilot Pen Tennis – Men's Singles
